Recitation: I am taking up less Space and becoming more Dense. More compact and on purpose, taut with intention. I AM STRONG. MY BODY HEALS ITSELF. I can teach my body to move right on time. My body is me. And I am in My Body. I can hone Muscles and movement and CHERISH my body and Mind. My Body and Mind are one power and there is BEYOND right here with me. I am healing now and Learning control. I am patient and caring to my body. NOW I will make my way Easy and what I need to leave, I will make Hard. I will make my environment a part of my system. My work is Learning, My Joy is my work and Creation. My Legacy is exponential Understanding. It is Working. It is working slowly, but I am building. I am making Left Write Right.
